import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Animais } from '../animais'; @Component({ selector: 'app-grade-fotos-animais', templateUrl: './grade-fotos-animais.component.html', styleUrls: ['./grade-fotos-animais.component.css'], }) export class GradeFotosAnimaisComponent implements OnInit { @Input() animais!: Animais; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
